examples.input:
Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Handouts are unfair when they go to businesses, not consumers
(B) Handouts are fine when they go to businesses, not consumers

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) An NFL Head coach with a losing record that hasn't been on a field on ten years? This is gonna go great
(B) An NFL Head coach with a losing record that hasn't been on a field on ten years? This is gonna go terribly

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) Assuming the country that historically is constantly over throwing its government doesn't like their government is an unreasonable assumption
(B) Assuming the country that historically is constantly over throwing its government doesn't like their government is a reasonable assumption

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) So he's planning to continue leaving useless space junk in orbit literally just because he can. What a horrible person
(B) So he's planning to continue leaving useless space junk in orbit literally just because he can. What a brilliant person

Which statement is sarcastic?
Options:
(A) But America is a more free country because they have democracy to protect them from that sort of tyranny
(B) But America is a more free country because they have guns to protect them from that sort of tyranny
